abstract.para: The section focuses on how to change the &nm; behavior, changing or adding values in the configuration file.

topic.para: The main configuration file for the &nm; is /etc/NetworkManager/NetworkManager.conf. This file can be used to configure the behavior of &nm;.

The file consists of sections of key-value pairs. Each key-value pair must belong to a section. A section starts with a name enclosed in []. Lines beginning with a # are considered comments. The minimal configuration needs to include the [main] section with the plugins value:
The keyfile plug-in supports all the connection types and capabilities of &nm;.
The default configuration file contains the connectivity section that specifies the URI to check the network connection.
On &slema;, you can also use other sections. For details, refer to networkmanager.conf(5) or Gnome's developer guide.
